nodes.text: Katlock was a Nautolan female and the matriarch of a family that lived in Black Spire Outpost on Outer Rim planet Batuu. She was the grandmother of Ksana. Katlock and her family were the neighbors of farmer Julen Rakab. She had long, purple tentacles that were speckled with sun spots.
Katlock first appeared in A Crash of Fate, a 2019 young-adult novel written by Zoraida Córdova as part of the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge multimedia project.
